title: looking for a teacher, above bronze plz :)
body: I'm a bronze 3 player my in game name is jk8062, I'm good at bot games but when I play actual normal matches more than often my team loses, I get blamed sometimes and im not gonna lie, in game I tend to psych myself out a little. my friend compared me to his wife who I think is a little worse than I and he thinks we're equals, I was slightly offended by this. I would use all the mentoring programs but I have curse voice, not raid call or team speak. anyways im 15 y/o I main top and mid, my two best champs are zed and talon but I have a champion for every role. anyways any help at all would be appreciated

replies.body: Hey I can help teach you a thing or two to get up to silver and higher if you get good at it, since I main top and my friend can give some tips since he mains zed, if you are interested just add me AccursedDream

id play a game or 2 with you if you add me (tomorrow) // 
PRO TIP 1: buy 1 ward on every b. the trinket is fine, but you still gotta buy that 1 ward (minimum).
PRO TIP 2: play safe, a kill is not worth if you had to die to get it, unless your kill had considerably more gold attached such as an assist or a shutdown. 

(of course there are exceptions to tip number 2, but the general idea that constantly trading keeps you at an even level with the enemy team whilst the rest of your team falls behind. So its best to just not die)
I can help you. But I'll have to do it tomorrow sometime. Add me in game.
